text: a winter storm which is battered the

triggering blizzard conditions with zero
visibility in places several states have
declared emergencies and residents
across the eastern seaboard have been
told to avoid unnecessary travel here's
our north american correspondent peter
bose
a blanket of snow covers times square in

deserted as most people hunker down at
